propositions.text: 早上8:00起床，赶上八点的课。
大学里的生活，忙碌而充实。
大学生活，就是学习，就是进步。
听大学老师说，要努力学习，才能有出息。
大学老师也经常鼓励我们，不要辜负了时光。
“啊，是啊，好久不见，半年了吧，回来啦！”
“嗯，半年了，感觉一切都变了，又好像什么都没变。”
“是啊，大学就是这样，时间过得飞快。”
“是啊，大学时光，永远是人生中最美好的回忆。”
“大学生活，给了我太多太多，让我的人生充满了希望。”
“大学，教会我太多太多，让我明白了什么才是真正的自己。”
“大学，是我人生中最宝贵的财富。”
“大学，让我学会了独立，学会了坚强，学会了成长。”
“大学，是我人生中最美好的时光。”

concepts.name: 大学
concepts.context: Refers to university life, experiences, and its significance in one's life.

concepts.name: 时光
concepts.context: Refers to the passage of time, particularly in the context of university.

concepts.name: 生活
concepts.context: Describes the general state of being or activities, specifically university life.

concepts.name: 学习
concepts.context: Refers to the act of acquiring knowledge and skills, central to university.

concepts.name: 老师
concepts.context: Refers to university instructors and their influence.

concepts.name: 财富
concepts.context: Used metaphorically to describe the immense value of university experiences.

concepts.name: 美好
concepts.context: Describes the positive and cherished nature of university times and memories.

concepts.name: 成长
concepts.context: Refers to personal development and maturation.

concepts.name: 希望
concepts.context: Refers to a feeling of expectation and desire for future success.

concepts.name: 时间
concepts.context: Refers to the concept of time and its rapid passage.

concepts.name: 回忆
concepts.context: Refers to past events that are remembered.

concepts.name: 坚强
concepts.context: Refers to emotional resilience and strength.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured hierarchically, starting with a main heading '# 重生1998' and a sub-heading '## 1998'. The content then elaborates on the university experience in 1998, featuring a conversation and introspective thoughts about the value and nature of university life. The propositions generally follow a linear progression describing the setting, activities, and reflections.
